# Create the matrix
```{r}
set.seed(5858)
a_matrix <- matrix(sample(0:100, 5 * 10, replace = TRUE), nrow = 5, ncol = 10)

colnames(a_matrix) <- c("cond1", "cond2", "cond3", "cond4", "cond5", "ctrl1", "ctrl2", "ctrl3", "ctrl4", "ctrl5")

rownames(a_matrix) <- paste("gene", 1:5, sep = "")

a_matrix
```
# Compute fold change
```{r}
cond_cols <- colnames(a_matrix)[1:5]
ctrl_cols <- colnames(a_matrix)[6:10]

fold_change_df <- data.frame(matrix(NA, nrow = nrow(a_matrix), ncol = length(cond_cols)))

colnames(fold_change_df) <- paste("Condition", 1:5, sep = "")
rownames(fold_change_df) <- rownames(a_matrix)

for (i in seq_along(cond_cols)) {
  fold_change_df[, i] <- a_matrix[, cond_cols[i]] / a_matrix[, ctrl_cols[i]]
}

fold_change_df
```
